column1: Table 17. Number and percent of local jail jurisdictions reporting to Mortality in Correctional Institutions, by number of deaths reported each year, 2000–2019
Report title: Mortality in Local Jails, 2000–2019 – Statistical Tables   NCJ 301368
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Mortality in Correctional Institutions, 2000–2019
Author: E. Ann Carson, Ph.D., BJS Statistician
Table 17. Number and percent of local jail jurisdictions reporting to Mortality in Correctional Institutions, by number of deaths reported each year, 2000–2019

column16: Median jail jurisdiction daily population, by number of deaths reported*

column1: Note: Data may have been revised from previously published statistics. Includes all local jails that reported data on populations or deaths. See Methodology.
*Median is calculated using the average daily population of all jails with that number of deaths.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Mortality in Correctional Institutions, 2000–2019.
